00018 VBO TObject::Create(Lib3dsMesh *mesh)
00019 {  
00020     m_name = mesh->name;
00021     m_scale = glm::vec3(1.0);
00022     m_shadow_cast = true;
00023     m_shadow_receive = true;
00024     m_draw_object = true;
00025     m_type = EXTERN;
00026     m_drawmode = GL_TRIANGLES;
00027     m_element_indices = false;
00028 
00029     //count faces
00030     m_vbo.indices = mesh->nfaces;
00031 
00032     // Allocate memory for our vertices and normals
00033     TVertex *vertices = new TVertex[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00034     TVertex *normals = new TVertex[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00035     TCoord *texcoords = new TCoord[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00036 
00037     unsigned int FinishedFaces = 0;
00038     lib3ds_mesh_calculate_vertex_normals(mesh, &normals[FinishedFaces*3]);
00039     // Loop through every face
00040     for(unsigned curr_face = 0; curr_face < mesh->nfaces; curr_face++)
00041     {
00042         Lib3dsFace *face = &mesh->faces[curr_face];
00043         for(unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00044         {
00045             //vertices
00046             memcpy(&vertices[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->vertices[face->index[i]], sizeof(TVertex) );
00047             //texture coordinates (if present)
00048             if(mesh->texcos != NULL)
00049                 memcpy(&texcoords[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->texcos[face->index[i]], sizeof(TCoord) );
00050         }
00051         FinishedFaces++;
00052     }
00053     //swap Y and Z coordinate in normals and vertices (3ds BUG)
00054     for(unsigned i=0; i<m_vbo.indices * 3; i++)
00055     {
00056         std::swap(*(vertices[i]+1),*(vertices[i]+2));
00057         *(vertices[i]+2) *= -1.0;
00058         std::swap(*(normals[i]+1),*(normals[i]+2));
00059         *(normals[i]+2) *= -1.0;
00060     }
00061 
00062     //Vertex array
00063     glGenVertexArrays(1, &m_vbo.vao);
00064     glBindVertexArray(m_vbo.vao);
00065 
00066     //Allocate and assign three VBO to our handle (vertices, normals and texture coordinates)
00067     glGenBuffers(4, m_vbo.buffer);
00068 
00069     //store vertices into buffer
00070     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_VERTEX]);
00071     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(TVertex) * 3 * m_vbo.indices, vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00072     // vertices are on index 0 and contains three floats per vertex
00073     glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(0), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00074     glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
00075 
00076     //store normals into buffer
00077     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_NORMAL]);
00078     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(TVertex) * 3 * m_vbo.indices, normals, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00079     // normals are on index 1 and contains three floats per vertex
00080     glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(1), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00081     glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
00082 
00083     //store texture coordinates
00084     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_TEXCOORD]);    
00085     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(TCoord) * 3 * m_vbo.indices, texcoords, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00086     //coordinates are on index 2 and contains two floats per vertex
00087     glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(2), 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00088     glEnableVertexAttribArray(2);
00089 
00090     glBindVertexArray(0);
00091 
00092     // Clean up our allocated memory
00093     delete [] vertices;
00094     delete [] normals;
00095     delete [] texcoords;
00096 
00097     //return VBO structure
00098     return m_vbo;
00099 }

00111 VBO TObject::Create(const char *name, const char *file, bool load)
00112 {  
00113     m_name = name;
00114     m_scale = glm::vec3(1.0);
00115     m_shadow_cast = true;
00116     m_shadow_receive = true;
00117     m_draw_object = true;
00118     m_type = EXTERN;
00119     m_drawmode = GL_TRIANGLES;
00120     m_element_indices = false;
00121 
00122     //don't load object if it has been loaded before
00123     if(!load) 
00124     {
00125         //set VAO and VBO from existing data
00126         glBindVertexArray(m_vbo.vao);
00127         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_VERTEX]);
00128         // vertices are on index 0 and contains three floats per vertex
00129         glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(0), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00130         glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
00131 
00132         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_NORMAL]);
00133         // normals are on index 1 and contains three floats per vertex
00134         glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(1), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00135         glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
00136 
00137         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_TEXCOORD]); 
00138         //coordinates are on index 2 and contains two floats per vertex
00139         glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(2), 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00140         glEnableVertexAttribArray(2);
00141 
00142         glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_INDEX]);
00143 
00144         glBindVertexArray(0);
00145         return m_vbo;
00146     }
00147 
00149     //Load 3DS file using lib3ds
00150     cout<<"Loading object "<<file<<"...";
00151     Lib3dsFile *model;
00152     model = lib3ds_file_open(file);
00153     if(!model)
00154     {
00155         ShowMessage("Cannot open 3DS file!",false);
00156         return VBO();
00157     }
00158 
00159     //count faces
00160     m_vbo.indices = 0;
00161     // Loop through every mesh
00162     for(int i=0; i < model->nmeshes; i++)
00163     {
00164         // Add the number of faces this mesh has to the total faces
00165         m_vbo.indices += model->meshes[i]->nfaces;
00166     }
00167 
00168     // Allocate memory for our vertices and normals
00169     TVertex *vertices = new TVertex[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00170     TVertex *normals = new TVertex[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00171     TCoord *texcoords = new TCoord[m_vbo.indices * 3];
00172 
00173     unsigned int FinishedFaces = 0;
00174     // Loop through all the meshes
00175     for(int curr_mesh = 0; curr_mesh < model->nmeshes; curr_mesh++)
00176     {
00177         Lib3dsMesh *mesh = model->meshes[curr_mesh];
00178         lib3ds_mesh_calculate_vertex_normals(mesh, &normals[FinishedFaces*3]);
00179         // Loop through every face
00180         for(unsigned curr_face = 0; curr_face < mesh->nfaces; curr_face++)
00181         {
00182             Lib3dsFace *face = &mesh->faces[curr_face];
00183             for(unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00184             {
00185                 //vertices
00186                 memcpy(&vertices[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->vertices[face->index[i]], sizeof(TVertex) );
00187                 //texture coordinates
00188                 if(mesh->texcos != NULL)
00189                     memcpy(&texcoords[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->texcos[face->index[i]], sizeof(TCoord) );
00190             }
00191             FinishedFaces++;
00192         }
00193     }
00194 
00195     //swap Y and Z coordinate in normals and vertices (3ds BUG)
00196     for(unsigned i=0; i<m_vbo.indices * 3; i++)
00197     {
00198         std::swap(*(vertices[i]+1),*(vertices[i]+2));
00199         *(vertices[i]+2) *= -1.0;
00200         std::swap(*(normals[i]+1),*(normals[i]+2));
00201         *(normals[i]+2) *= -1.0;
00202     }
00203 
00204     //Vertex array
00205     glGenVertexArrays(1, &m_vbo.vao);
00206     glBindVertexArray(m_vbo.vao);
00207 
00208     //Allocate and assign three VBO to our handle (vertices, normals and texture coordinates)
00209     glGenBuffers(4, m_vbo.buffer);
00210 
00211     //store vertices into buffer
00212     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_VERTEX]);
00213     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(TVertex) * 3 * m_vbo.indices, vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00214     // vertices are on index 0 and contains three floats per vertex
00215     glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(0), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00216     glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
00217 
00218     //store normals into buffer
00219     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_NORMAL]);
00220     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(TVertex) * 3 * m_vbo.indices, normals, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00221     // normals are on index 1 and contains three floats per vertex
00222     glVertexAttribPointer(GLuint(1), 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00223     glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
00224 
00225     //store texture coordinates
00226     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_vbo.buffer[P_TEXCOORD]);

00228     //coordinates are on index 2 and contains two floats per vertex

00230     glEnableVertexAttribArray(2);
00231 
00232     glBindVertexArray(0);
00233 
00234     // Clean up our allocated memory
00235     delete [] vertices;
00236     delete [] normals;
00237     delete [] texcoords;
00238 
00239     // We no longer need lib3ds
00240     lib3ds_file_free(model);
00241     model = NULL;
00242 
00243     cout<<"Done(vertices: "<<m_vbo.indices*3<<", faces: "<<m_vbo.indices<<")\n";
00244 
00245     //return VBO structure
00246     return m_vbo;
00247 }
